messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/16/2002 5:21:49 PM Eastern Standard Time,
westen@... writes:


> abput supanovas and black holes so we looked up info and I learned
> something, too.

I got something in the email the other day. Meant to post it. Maybe I did
(braindead)? Saturn will be closer to the earth Tuesday than in thirty
yrears. Find a telescope. Even a small one will do. The planet will be tilted
so that the rings are very visible.

~Kelly
